author: Blake Schuster
title: Thunder's Danilo Gallinari Funds 400 Coronavirus Testing Kits in Oklahoma City
description: The  Oklahoma City Thunder  were one of the first  NBA  teams to undergo club-wide testing for the coronavirus after  Utah Jazz  big man Rudy Gobert tested positive while preparing to play in OKC...
content:
Michael Dwyer/Associated Press
The Oklahoma City Thunder were one of the first NBA teams to undergo club-wide testing for the coronavirus after Utah Jazz big man Rudy Gobert tested positive while preparing to play in OKC.
Thunder forward Danilo Gallinari is… [+2162 chars]
